item.title: Palawan Tribe
item.description:
ğŸŒ¿âœ¨ Overview

The Palawan Tribe website is a digital window into the life, values, and stories of the tribal communities of Palawan (Philippines).
Born as a non-profit initiative, the project aims to spread awareness and inspire respect for a culture often overlooked by mainstream media.
All content is written with heart, simplicity, and deep connection to the people involved.

ğŸš€ Technologies

  • Hugo (static site generator)
  • Custom HTML/CSS for a warm and immersive visual experience
  • Netlify for free continuous deployment and hosting
  • Native multilingual structure with separated content folders (IT / EN)
  • Ethical SEO: optimized indexing without ads or tracking

ğŸ“‚ Project structure

âœ¨ Key features

  • Ultra-light navigation, ideal for slow or mobile connections
  • Bilingual content (IT/EN) with optional future expansion
  • Sections dedicated to history, vision, photo gallery, contact
  • Visual design inspired by indigenous culture: color, balance, symbols
  • Hosted on green-powered Netlify, sustainable and free
